name: ParticipantFlowMeasure_Inclusion_in_analysis
title: ParticipantFlowMeasure: Inclusion in analysis
citeAs: ParticipantFlowMeasure: Inclusion in analysis [Database Entry: FHIR EvidenceVariable Resource]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper [Authors/Creators]. description: This example expresses the variable 'Inclusion in analysis' as a dichotomous variable with a simple definition using definition.concept.text and is used with the ParticipantFlow Profile of Evidence in the Evidence.variableDefinition with variableRole='outcome'
